title: You’ve suddenly lost your best talent, what is it, and how would it affect your daily life? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think my best talent is my ability to tell stories. If I lost that I think I would be ok. I’m not really using it. Being a writer is very difficult and arduous and the competition is tough. Like doing anything in music. I would just keep writing code and moving forward. No big deal.

I would no longer be able to understand applied mathematics. I would probably become severely depressed after some time because it is the most awesome thing I have. Maybe you can compare it to lose the love of your life or your best friend or something like that.
